lines.text:
[Referring to Ted Rogers]
Tell me the truth, Miss Regan, do you honestly think he's human?
I've heard people bet both ways.
Well, my mother loves me.
I'll bet she was disappointed. I'll bet she wanted a child.
She got one. Look up the records. I was born at Mercy Hospital.
Were you sick?
No, I wanted to be near my mother.
[Ted is drunk]

[whispering]
Don't you think Ted has had enough?
You whisperin' about me?
Oh, no. What gives you that idea?
I don't know. Am I being very extraordinary
[hiccups]
"Extraordinary". That's a funny one.
[drinks more champagne]
How do you feel?
I feel very... gling glong. Thank you.
Gling glong?

[to Frecklehead]
How long have you had freckles?
All my life! I hate them!
Well, I think they are very becoming.

[Angrily]
Shows what you know!
